participant_1.background:
I work as a waiter and try my best to be a good father.
My most valued material possession is the notebook I keep my short stories in.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.
i graduated from princeton.

participant_2.background:
I love to watch movies, even though it's not the most productive use of my time.
i work out to look good.
i barely show up to work.
I love cooking and my favorite food is what I prepare in my home.
i ve had the same job for 8 years.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Nothing much, just taking it easy. What about you?
I'm working on a short story. I'm a waiter and father, but writing is my passion.
That's cool. I've always wanted to write a book, but I'm not sure where to start.
I think it's a great idea! You should start by writing down your ideas and then see where they take you.
That's a good idea. I'm always so busy with work that I don't have much time to write.
I know what you mean. I work long hours too, but I try to make time for my writing.
It's important to have a creative outlet.
Exactly! That's why I write. It helps me to relax and de-stress.
I'm glad you have something that you enjoy doing.
Thanks! I know it's not the most productive use of my time, but it's something I love to do.
It sounds like you're very passionate about it.
I am! I love writing and I'm always thinking of new ideas.
That's great! I hope you keep writing.
